es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.util.topn

Class AbstractTopN<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<T>
      • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.core.util.topn.AbstractTopN<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the objects in the heap
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<T>, Collection<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntDoubleTopN, ObjectDoubleTopN, TopN

    public abstract class AbstractTopN<T>
extends AbstractCollection<T>
    Bounded min-heap to keep just the top-n greatest objects.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
